silver.name: Silver
silver.description: Silver coins used by all for trade and commerce.

piecesOfEight.name: Pieces of Eight
piecesOfEight.description: An exclusive currency minted by the Helm. Deliver these to a haven to stash them for use in the Black Market, or your Helm Empire.

copperBars.name: Kupfer Bars
copperBars.description: A significant, high-grade metal from Europe, from refining copper to its highest purity. Makes it viable for applications for war.

silverLions.name: Silver Lions
silverLions.description: Silver coins designed personally by Scurlock, minted and shipped from their home countries. Perhaps they are intended currency for when Scurlock one day rules the Indian Ocean, or so he believes.

fish.name: Fish
fish.description: Mild flavor with a soft texture.

ndizi.name: Ndizi
ndizi.description: Popular for its sweet taste, those used for cooking are often called plantains.

primeCrocodileMeat.name: Prime Crocodile Meat
primeCrocodileMeat.description: Best cut of meat from a Crocodile.

sharkMeat.name: Shark Meat
sharkMeat.description: Strong, sour smell. Would taste better cooked.

rawMutton.name: Raw Mutton
rawMutton.description: Cooking the mutton will reduce its strongly bitter taste.

primeHippoMeat.name: Prime Hippo Meat
primeHippoMeat.description: Best cut of meat from a Hippo.

screwpine.name: Screwpine
screwpine.description: The fruit can be boiled and ground into an edible, highly nutritious paste.

durian.name: Durian
durian.description: A large fruit with a strong odor and covered with thorns.

tylosaurusFlesh.name: Tylosaurus Flesh
tylosaurusFlesh.description: The meat of a beast that stalks the African Coast, feasting on unfortunate seafarers.

pureIron.name: Pure Iron
pureIron.description: Metal ore that contains much greater amounts of iron.

ironwood.name: Ironwood
ironwood.description: One of the hardest and heaviest woods.

tornSail.name: Torn Sail
tornSail.description: A piece of cloth that was torn off from a sail. Requires Crowbar to harvest from shipwrecks.

scavengedWood.name: Scavenged Wood
scavengedWood.description: A piece of wood removed from a ship hull. Requires Crowbar to harvest from shipwrecks.

metalSalvage.name: Metal Salvage
metalSalvage.description: Sheet of metal that has been ripped from its ship hoardings. Requires Crowbar to harvest from shipwrecks.

ironwoodPlank.name: Ironwood Plank
ironwoodPlank.description: Flimsy, basic planks used to craft basic ships and equipment.

crudeSaltpeter.name: Crude Saltpeter
crudeSaltpeter.description: Natural, muddy agent that is critical for gunpowder.

rustyNail.name: Rusty Nail
rustyNail.description: Pieces of nails that have rusted. Requires Crowbar to harvest from shipwrecks.

copper.name: Copper
copper.description: Reddish, malleable metal that has a variety of uses.

castIronIngot.name: Cast Iron Ingot
castIronIngot.description: Sturdy but impure metal used to craft basic ships and equipment.

jute.name: Jute
jute.description: A soft, shiny fiber that has a variety of uses.

cobaltIngot.name: Cobalt Ingot
cobaltIngot.description: Refined Cobalt ore. It is smelted into an ingot. It is used in crafting ships, weapons, and furniture.

teakPlank.name: Teak Plank
teakPlank.description: Incredibly strong wood used to craft the finest ships and equipment.

iroko.name: Iroko
iroko.description: A type of wood believed to have healing properties.

lime.name: Lime
lime.description: A strong building material which can be molded into bricks and mortar.

nickel.name: Nickel
nickel.description: Lustrous silver metal that is corrosion resistant.

steelIngot.name: Steel Ingot
steelIngot.description: Incredibly strong metal to craft the finest ships and equipment.

cobalt.name: Cobalt
cobalt.description: Rare metal used since ancient times to add a blue tinge to glass and ceramics.

irokoPlank.name: Iroko Plank
irokoPlank.description: Stronger, pliable wood used to craft advanced ships and equipment.

sisal.name: Sisal
sisal.description: A stiff, saltwater-resistant fiber that is very durable.

castingSand.name: Casting Sand
castingSand.description: Metal sand for casting shapes in a blacksmith's foundry.

acaciaPlank.name: Acacia Plank
acaciaPlank.description: Flimsy, basic planks used to craft basic ships and equipment.

nickelIngot.name: Nickel Ingot
nickelIngot.description: Refined Nickel ore. It is smelted into an ingot. It is used in crafting ships, weapons, and furniture.

bogIron.name: Bog Iron
bogIron.description: Iron ore typically found in low-lying areas.

juniperPlank.name: Juniper Plank
juniperPlank.description: Stronger, pliable wood used to craft advanced ships and equipment.

fineAbaka.name: Fine Abaka
fineAbaka.description: Refined fabric from Abaka plants. It is used in crafting ships, weapons, and furniture.

screwMechanism.name: Screw Mechanism
screwMechanism.description: A basic winding screw for binding metal and wood frames together.

mopanePlank.name: Mopane Plank
mopanePlank.description: Wood planks used to craft basic ships and equipment.

fineLinen.name: Fine Linen
fineLinen.description: Flexible and smooth fabric used to craft advanced ships and equipment.

cogwheel.name: Cogwheel
cogwheel.description: Simple turning wheel that can be slotted into wooden supports.

woodTar.name: Wood Tar
woodTar.description: Crude water sealant for ships, sails, and everything on them.

fineJute.name: Fine Jute
fineJute.description: Flexible but ugly fabric used to craft basic ships and equipment.

fineSisal.name: Fine Sisal
fineSisal.description: Refined fabric from Sisal plants. It is used in crafting ships, weapons, and furniture.

sharkLeather.name: Shark Leather
sharkLeather.description: Very durable leather refined from Shark Skin. Can be used for crafting a variety of items.

thickCrocodileLeather.name: Thick Crocodile Leather
thickCrocodileLeather.description: Extremely strong and sturdy leather refined from Thick Crocodile Skin. Can be used for crafting a variety of items.

crocodileLeather.name: Crocodile Leather
crocodileLeather.description: Highly strong and sturdy leather refined from Crocodile Skin. Can be used for crafting a variety of items.

zincIngot.name: Zinc Ingot
zincIngot.description: Refined Zinc ore. It is smelted into an ingot. It is used in crafting ships, weapons, and furniture.

brokenPlank.name: Broken Plank
brokenPlank.description: A piece of wood that has come loose from a hull. Requires Crowbar to harvest from shipwrecks.

sheetGlass.name: Sheet Glass
sheetGlass.description: Thick glass for items that need sight-lines.

fineHemp.name: Fine Hemp
fineHemp.description: Incredibly strong fabric used to craft the finest ships and equipment.

hippoLeather.name: Hippo Leather
hippoLeather.description: Incredibly tough leather refined from Hippo Skin. Can be used for crafting a variety of items.

greenheartPlank.name: Greenheart Plank
greenheartPlank.description: Incredibly strong wood used to craft advanced ships and equipment.

roselleCloth.name: Roselle Cloth
roselleCloth.description: Incredibly strong fabric used to craft the finest ships and equipment.

precisionDrillingBit.name: Precision Drilling Bit
precisionDrillingBit.description: Hand-forged metal drill bit for accurate engineering work.

greenheart.name: Greenheart
greenheart.description: Olive-colored wood resistant to rot and insect attacks.

roselle.name: Roselle
roselle.description: Fiber that has a high strength-to-weight ratio.

fineRamie.name: Fine Ramie
fineRamie.description: Refined fabric from ramie plants. It is used in crafting ships, weapons, and furniture.

ramie.name: Ramie
ramie.description: A strong, absorbent textile made from the fibers of the flax plant.

teak.name: Teak
teak.description: A type o f wood known for its durability and water resistance.

hemp.name: Hemp
hemp.description: One of the first plants to be turned into usable fiber.

abaka.name: Abaka
abaka.description: Hard fiber obtained from a species of banana plant.

juniper.name: Juniper
juniper.description: A type of wood extremely strong for its weight.

apexCrocodileLeather.name: Apex Crocodile Leather
apexCrocodileLeather.description: Strong and sturdy leather refined from Apex Crocodile Skin. Can be used for crafting a variety of items.

apexHippoLeather.name: Apex Hippo Leather
apexHippoLeather.description: Durable leather refined from Apex Hippo Skin. Can be used for crafting a variety of items.

rubber.name: Rubber
rubber.description: A natural compound that is both stretchy and water-resistant.

magnetite.name: Magnetite
magnetite.description: Iron ore that led to the discovery of magnetism in ancient times.

magnetiteIngot.name: Magnetite Ingot
magnetiteIngot.description: Incredibly strong metal to craft the finest ships and equipment.

linen.name: Linen
linen.description: A strong, absorbent textile made from the fibers of the flax plant.

torsionSpring.name: Torsion Spring
torsionSpring.description: An inhumanly large spring normally meant for industrial sites.

bronzeIngot.name: Bronze Ingot
bronzeIngot.description: Stronger, heavier metal used to craft advanced ships and equipment.

zinc.name: Zinc
zinc.description: Rare metal used since ancient times for alloying.

repairKit1.name: Repair Kit I
repairKit1.description: Mends a minimal amount of the ship's hull.

repairKit2.name: Repair Kit II
repairKit2.description: Mends a modest amount of the ship's hull.

repairKit3.name: Repair Kit III
repairKit3.description: Mends a moderate amount of the ship's hull.

monstrousTooth.name: Monstrous Tooth
monstrousTooth.description: Yanked from the maw of a beast dubbed "Jaws of Vengeance" by the Ungwana.

vengefulEssence.name: Vengeful Essence
vengefulEssence.description: An otherworldly fuel that releases constant waves of ominous energy. Touching it makes you feel as if you are being scorched by hellish flames, but they leave no trace on your skin after leaving your hands.

etherealAshes.name: Ethereal Ashes
etherealAshes.description: A mound of nearly translucent ash that pulses with a spectral glow. You are unable to feel the fine grains with your fingers, but they send an inexplicable chill down your spine.

eelsTwine.name: Eels' Twine
eelsTwine.description: Sturdy strings woven by the Eels, useful in crafting Ballistas.

wyrmsBreath.name: Wyrm's Breath
wyrmsBreath.description: A highly flammable pitch and solvent for explosives concocted by the Wyrms.

orcasMechanism.name: Orcas' Mechanism
orcasMechanism.description: A circular linchpin designed by the Orcas. Used in construction where high tension is required.

gannetsSaltpeter.name: Gannets' Saltpeter
gannetsSaltpeter.description: An immensely powerful chemical for gunpowder used in modern weapons, refined by the Gannets.

dryCastingSand.name: Dry Sand
dryCastingSand.description: casting sand that has been compacted to forge dense, heavy shapes.

lacquer.name: Lacquer
lacquer.description: A stronger mix of shellac that is used to bind wood together and waterproofing.

woodPitch.name: Wood Pitch
woodPitch.description: A purified sealent for hulls, sails, and anything exposed to the ocean.

plateGlass.name: Plate Glass
plateGlass.description: Sealed and sheeted glass, which forms a nearly shatterproof bond.

sinewString.name: Sinew String
sinewString.description: An extremely tough string made by the Clan of Fara that can be used for crafting complex items. Generally found in the Red Isle.

upgradeParts.name: Upgrade Parts
upgradeParts.description: A set of master-crafted parts that can be used for upgrading.

lestarisSkin.name: Lestari's Skin
lestarisSkin.description: Tough hide hewn from the slain Lestari.

hubacHeirloom.name: Hubac Heirloom
hubacHeirloom.description: Relic that has been passed down for generations within the Hubac family.

blackAriaShipPart.name: Black Aria Sword
blackAriaShipPart.description: A broken part taken from Armand Hubac's Black Aria. Looks like a sword.

whiteAriaShipPart.name: White Aria Shield
whiteAriaShipPart.description: A part of Bertrand Hubac's White Aria flagship. Looks like a shield.

cork.name: Cork
cork.description: Left over from Yanita's concoctions. Highly valuable to some.

ice.name: Ice
ice.description: A tropical wonder that's cold to the touch.

lestarisMeat.name: Lestari's Meat
lestarisMeat.description: Meat obtained from the sea monster Lestari.

jadeDragon.name: Jade Dragon
jadeDragon.description: An ornate token that can be used in the store for a special occasion.

naphtha.name: Naphtha
naphtha.description: A powerful solvent used to dissolve stubborn substances, including one's foes.

zamaharibuScales.name: Zamaharibu Scales
zamaharibuScales.description: The tough, leathery hide of a beast that's hard to kill and ferocious as a sea storm.

quicklime.name: Quicklime
quicklime.description: Purified from coarse lime, which is far quicker to act and bond to different surfaces.

purifiedSaltpeter.name: Purified Saltpeter
purifiedSaltpeter.description: A pure and potent form of Saltpeter known for its versatility and reliability. Remember to handle with care and respect.

planetaryGearset.name: Planetary Gearset
planetaryGearset.description: A clock-like arrangement of cogwheels, common in construction of advanced turning mechanisms.

wormDrive.name: Worm Drive
wormDrive.description: A compact gear system that translates rotations into smooth, precise movements.

lightningDragonClaw.name: Lightning Dragon Claw
lightningDragonClaw.description: A claw left behind by a lightning dragon. It oozes electrifying energy even in a dormant state.

lightningDragonScale.name: Lightning Dragon Scale
lightningDragonScale.description: A magnificent scale left behind by a lightning dragon. It retains its radiance and luminosity even in a dormant state.

phoenixBeak.name: Phoenix Beak
phoenixBeak.description: A broken piece from the ram of Li Tian Ning's flagship. Can be repurposed due to its incredible resilience.

phoenixPinion.name: Phoenix Pinion
phoenixPinion.description: The studded sails from Li Tian Ning's flagship. It is capable of mending other objects due to its versatility.

azureDragonHead.name: Azure Dragon Head
azureDragonHead.description: The head of a dragon from COmmander Zhang's flagship. Such a mighty beast beheaded signals the Emperor's coming wrath.

plagueDust.name: Plague Dust
plagueDust.description: A sinister, powdery substance, infused with the essence of venom and malice.

blightedFuel.name: Blighted Fuel
blightedFuel.description: A toxic elixir harvested from the bowels of La Peste's flagship, which exudes a malevolent energy.

yellowDragonBanner.name: Yellow Dragon Banner
yellowDragonBanner.description: A banner ripped from Commander Zhang's flagship. It features a yellow dragon soaring high in the clouds.

jadePhoenixStatue.name: Jade Phoenix Statue
jadePhoenixStatue.description: A statue of a phoenix made of pure jade. One of the few prized possessions of Li Tian Ning.

eelSturdyRopes.name: Eel Sturdy Ropes
eelSturdyRopes.description: Made by weaving twine together and processing it with other materials. Known for its reliability and resilience.

wyrmVolatileNapalm.name: Wyrm Volatile Napalm
wyrmVolatileNapalm.description: A highly combustible fluid made from a long and complicated distillation process. A tiny spark can lead to mass destruction.

orcaIntricateApparatus.name: Orca Intricate Apparatus
orcaIntricateApparatus.description: A system of complex mechanisms formed from gears and pieces. Put together, it achieves maximum efficiency.

gannetDenseNiter.name: Gannet Dense Niter
gannetDenseNiter.description: Saltpeter refined further to achieve its purest state. Can be used as an ingredient for weapons and ammo.

xanthousStone.name: Xanthous Stone
xanthousStone.description: A luminous golden shard that pulses with a spectral glow. You can almost hear faint echoes and voices up close.

putrefiedZamaharibuScale.name: Putrefied Zamaharibu Scale
putrefiedZamaharibuScale.description: Decayed scale of Zamaharibu. Gives off a putrid odor, with scars all over is surface. Possibly resurrected by a mysterious power.

putrefiedLestariSkin.name: Putrefied Lestari Skin
putrefiedLestariSkin.description: Decayed hide of Lestari. Marked by wounds that refuse to heal. Possibly resurrected by a mysterious power.

artisansRefinementPack.name: Artisan's Refinement Pack
artisansRefinementPack.description: A curated collection of rare tools and materials designed to upgrade cosmetic items to have more intricate details.

xanthousGemstone.name: Xanthous Gemstone
xanthousGemstone.description: A gem of brilliance that emits a mesmerizing radiance. You can't quite place its shape and form.

masterworkKit.name: Masterwork Kit
masterworkKit.description: A set of master-forged tools used to fully upgrade ship and equipment.

ascensionModule.name: Ascension Module
ascensionModule.description: An advanced device that upgrades items, adding graded modification slots for customization with powerful and unique modifications.

primevalFang.name: Primeval Fang
primevalFang.description: A monstrous fang from a beast from the depths. Whoever possesses one must have braved its jaws.
